author: Simon Difford
description: Delicately spirituous spiced honeyed apple interplay in this long, refreshing cocktail.
name: Bee Sting
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
45 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
